financial analyst.title: Financial Analyst
financial analyst.description: AI is rapidly changing financial analysis by automating data processing and trend identification, shifting the human role towards strategy and client relations.

marketing manager.title: Marketing Manager
marketing manager.description: AI-powered analytics platforms are augmenting marketing strategies. The role now requires combining data insights with creative and strategic campaigns.

graphic designer.title: Graphic Designer
graphic designer.description: Generative AI tools are becoming powerful assistants for creative work, changing workflows and requiring new skills in prompting and curation.

nurse.title: Nurse
nurse.description: While AI assists in diagnostics and administration, the core nursing responsibilities of patient care heavily rely on complex human interaction and empathy.

software developer.title: Software Developer
software developer.description: AI code assistants and automated testing are changing the development lifecycle, emphasizing the need for skills in system architecture and AI integration.
